snippet.title: Epic Dragons - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game here:
http://bit.ly/ZN1nGj

Behind the story of the crystal islands lies a battle in-between creatures and Dragons, where the creatures are trying to steal crystals from the dragon's world. With the Dragons, your objective is to defend the land and even more, your crystals! On EPIC DRAGONS you will be able to create and share your own levels for others to play. 

Within the game you will have:

 - 60+ free to play levels, 
 - 9 dragons, 
 - 6 different abilities
 - A full store of crystals
 - A whole editor where you can create your own levels
 - A community where you can play levels from friends and also share your levels.
 - A level editor with 3 themes and features to triggers to enhance others gameplay.
